name: Moth Game 0.2.2a
description:
Public Preview Build 0.2.2a2p
Mechanics demo, environment art and sounds are placeholder

!!! Hey !!!
The flying is pretty unintuitive and people have been having trouble with it, so here's a quick tutorial:
When jumping, double tap the jump button as fast as you can and hold the second press. This will let you reach the max altitude.
Don't forget about the airdodge either!

This will be fixed and made more intuitive and forgiving in the next build.

If you enjoyed this demo and would like to support this project, consider becoming a patron over at Patreon!

Have questions or comments? Check out the Discord server!
